text: Mauro Huerta Díaz (born 23 August 1967) is a Mexican politician from the Ecologist Green Party of Mexico. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing the Federal District. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:Ecologist Green Party of Mexico politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Mauro Huerta Díaz
